reviews.title: 50th Birthday holiday
reviews.content: we liked the look of the Distrikt Hotel as it was near Time square and the Places we wanted to go more down the Hudson River side, as this was my 2nd time in NYC I wanted to stay somewhere different from last time. The Hotel is small but it was just what we wanted who needs a big room when in NYC. Check in was quick with friendly staff and we had requested a high floor and we were on the 31st floor out of 32. The room was lovely big enough for me and my sister the only issue was not a lot of hanging space. The room was clean and bedding changed every other day. As It was my Birthday they sent up a lovely big Cupcake and a hand written card. We asked the hotel to book us a Taxi to return to JFK and we got a lovely private car which just finished off my lovely 50th Birthday holiday to NYC. I would go back to this Hotel when I go back to NYC. Thank you for your glowing Distrikt Hotel review! We are thrilled to have helped make your Birthday celebration a special one. Loved having a mid-town view to Times Square from the 28th floor king room. The room was nice but fairly basic, only place to site besides the bed was a desk chair. We arrived early, the friendly reception folks valeted the car and stored our bags while we saw a Broadway show then we checked in after dinner. overall very good experience. We like to think we are a great home base for all of our guests to begin their adventures here in NYC, as we are close to many wonderful attractions and sights. We hope you managed to explore many of the things NYC has to offer during your time with us. As a boutique hotel, we like to the stray away from the traditional hotel aesthetic in order to provide our guests with a unique and memorable experience. We hope you stay with us again on your next trip to NYC!

reviews.title: Fantastic hotel, superb location, friendly staff (& free wifi)
reviews.content: I stayed at the Distrikt in May and have nothing but praise for it. I booked because it was reasonably priced, especially for its location and offered free wifi in the rooms, not just the lobby. The staff were friendly & helpful. The room was a good size, had all the facilities you'd want (fridge, safe, tea/coffee making facilities etc.) and the free wifi was always working. Location wise, it was ideal for me, as theatre was my primary reason for visiting NYC, so staying on west 40th St was perfect. It was also close to metro stops too and despite being opposite the bus terminal was not noisy at all (I was on 19 floor). Travelling on my own, I also felt at ease in the vicinity of the hotel at night and also felt comfortable to be in the hotel's bar on my own in the evening. I definitely recommend this hotel and will almost certainly stay there again! Thanks for the super positive review! We are happy to hear that your stay in May was exceptional. So great that our staff, accommodations, value, and location was everything you were hoping for during your New York City trip. We are certainly delighted to hear that your stay was pleasant enough to feel like a "home away from home". We appreciate your recommendations and your breakdown of all the things that helped make your stay a great one. We love our return guests and hope to see you here with us again soon!

reviews.title: Another wonderful stay !
reviews.content: Can I just say while trying to write my review my last review last November has came up although it was published in November ??? Surely a big mistake that TripAdvisor should have corrected ?? Anyway my stay at my favourite hotel in Manhattan was again another wonderful experience. This is my 10th stay here and I would not contemplate staying anywhere else, I love it. Right in the middle of Midtown, walking distance all over the city (if you like to walk), subway if you don't. Theatres and restaurants on your doorstep. Port Authority on the next block, so handy to get to/from airports, to/from outlets, and you don't need to hunt for a taxi when you come back laden with your purchases !! The beds are so comfy, I always feel as if I have had a great sleep, no noise whatsoever (we were on the 30th floor). Everything in the room you need, great showers, lovely toiletries, tea/coffee, clock, and if there is something you need just phone the receptionist and they are there !Our housekeeper Mary kept our room spotless. WIFI is free and you just have to sign in after 24hrs and it is there. Lifts were no bother when we there, but most hotels lifts are busy in the morning with people checking out, so you expect that, who is in a hurry in the Big Apple anyway ?? Bar/caf√© downstairs is great for a pre theatre cocktail or a nightcap before bed, very relaxing. The staff are amazing !!! Thank you for an amazing stay Nesha, Sahara, Netanya, Kit, Sharis, Hadi,Mary, Dennis and Manny ! TILL THE NEXT TIME ! L.Forrest Thank you for another review to make us smile! We all look forward to each time you stay with us and it's always such a great pleasure to welcome back one of our best guest. We are delighted to say that this was your 10th visit to Distrikt and it won't be your last. We will certainly pass your kind words to our staff, I'm sure they will be touched to hear all of the wonderful things you have said about them. We cannot wait to welcome you back for your next visit! See you again soon until then take care!

reviews.title: Excellent location!
reviews.content: We stayed at the hotel for 7 nights, and its central location to the downturn and most tourist spots in NY city is the most competitive advantage. As expected, room is small and customer services are on average only. This is typical in NY I guess! Thanks for the positive review! We appreciate your opinions and hope you'll keep us in mind for the next time you frequent the Big Apple!

reviews.title: Great experience, great location!
reviews.content: This property was perfectly located. The room was comfortable, especially the bed. The service was wonderful and polite. We asked for a quiet room and we were listened to. We asked for a kettle to boil water for tea, and it promptly showed up at our door. We are elated to hear that we were able to meet all your expectations on your visit to the Big Apple. It's good knowing that our staff, location, and accommodations were satisfactory and that your trip went smoothly during your stay. We hope you might consider us again next time you return to NYC!

reviews.title: Great stay.
reviews.content: The hotel is a great little hotel. The rooms are a little small for three people but absolutely perfect for two who wish a single bed. The people was the most friendly of anywhere I have stayed and this being New York kind of surprise me. Thanks for the positive review! We appreciate your opinions and are happy to hear that our wonderful staff helped make your trip satisfactory. If you decide to stay with us in the future, please know that we have double rooms which are suitable for up to four guest. If you reserved a queen or king room type (which is suitable for two guest only) you can always ask to upgrade to one of our double rooms for an extra charge. This can be done in advance by contacting the hotel directly or when you arrive to the hotel. Again, thank you for taking the time to provide us with positive feedback about your stay.

reviews.title: Was expecting more
reviews.content: Was expecting more from this hotel. Cleanliness was good just in the first part of the journey. We spent there 5 nights and the no additional 2 nights. The first 5 nights were good. The last 2 nights were not good; room was really small for 3 people, bathroom was not clean as expected. Thank you for taking the time to reflect on your stay with us. Though you enjoyed the first part of your journey it does not sound like we were able to live up to your expectations overall. We hope you brought these issues up during your stay as we would of been able to rectify them. While we wish the entire duration of your stay was exceptional, we certainly thank you for taking the time to provide honest feedback on your experience. We hope you'll see fit to give us a chance at second impression on your next trip to NYC.

reviews.title: Great Location, Wonderful staff and service
reviews.content: Location: Perfect. Close to Broadway theatres and many restaurants around. Service: really wonderful staff from check in to bell people to cleaning staff. All are professional and pleasant. Every cleaning staff acknowledged guests and said hi in the hallway. Bell people Leo and another gentleman whose name I didn't get were always working hard to look after guests' luggage. They do it with enthusiasm and it shows. I would stay here again and again as long as the price is reasonable. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to be close to Times Square and many fabulous restaurants around. Thank you for your feedback! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and that you chose to write such a kind review. We do our best to ensure that every detail of a guests stay with us is absolutely perfect because we want your stay with us to be memorable and one you will look back on fondly. Thank you for your kind words about our staff, they work hard to make sure that each and every person that stays with us is given a wonderful experience. We will be sure to let Leo know of your praises! Thank you for you recommendations and consideration for future. We love our return guest and hope to see you here again with us soon!

reviews.title: Practical
reviews.content: Good location, very clean, room ok but small, good choice for a short visit Comfortable bed, amnesties good, coffee machine with poor coffee and without a refrigerator could not have milk for the coffee and keep some refrigerated food Thank you for your review! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to make use of the amenities we offer here at Distrikt. Most of our rooms are equipped with a mini fridge however, calling our front desk would be the most efficient way to solve in potential inconveniences. We are pleased to hear that our beds were beyond satisfactory and appreciate your breakdown of all of the things that helped make your short stay a great one. Please keep us in mind for your future visits to New York City!

reviews.title: Overally a Good Stay
reviews.content: Everything was great, clean nice and up to date. There were two thing ls i'd call out that I was unhappy with - I wish we knew we were going ti have a view if a break wall, the images on line sell all the rooms as city views. Also, the waitress at the restaurant was slow and about to stick us in such a tight corner when the entire restaurant was open and was super slow service, this threw me off a bit. Thank you for taking the time to reflect on your stay with us. Though we are pleased to have accommodated you in cleanliness and accommodations overall we were unable to meet all of your expectations. If you decide to stay with us in the future, please know that calling us directly is the best way to find out information about the hotel. Although usually below the image of each room type there is a description stating the amenities included, the room size, whether or not the room has a view and more, our team will take a look in to this manner. Again, thank you for your positive review we hope that you might consider us on your next visit to New York City!

reviews.title: Small - but Cute
reviews.content: The hotel is a nice hotel to stay at. Rooms are a little small, however I am from Texas where things are BIG. The staff was nice and answered my silly questions and made sure I was taken care of in all aspects. Nice Place to stay and will stay there again when back in NY. We are so excited to have lived up to your hotel needs during your stay with us! It is always comforting to hear that our accommodations and helpful staff were satisfactory. Thank you for your raving review and consideration for future stays. We love our return guests and hope to see you here with us again soon!

reviews.title: Great modern hotel with excellent staff
reviews.content: We stayed for 3 nights in May (during the heat wave) so it was great to have our cool room at hand. We received a warm welcome (and cold fruit water) at reception after a long day of travelling, and were helped with TV reception, bag storage and booking a car to the airport by staff who were all friendly, polite and efficient. The cosy little bar to the back of the ground floor was also a real bonus - with happy hours. Our room was on floor 6 with no view - but to be fair New York is all about getting out there, so we didn't really mind. The room was modern and clean with an empty fridge for use, coffee machine and hairdryer with a great bathroom with large shower. (bathroom products good - note - no shower gel) We found TV reception and wifi to be a bit inconsistent - you just have to keep logging in again. As others have mentioned, the street is experiencing quite a bit of construction, but you can easily access the subway, or get onto a better street for walking. Plenty of cafes, deli's and convenience stores within short walk for essentials. Excellent location for theatre visits. Would be happy to stay again. Thanks for the super positive review! We are happy to hear that your stay with us was exceptional and appreciate your breakdown of all the things that helped make your stay a great one. We will spread the good word to our staff as well. Please keep us in mind for your future visits to New York City!

reviews.title: Great overnight in Manhattan
reviews.content: Excellent value ; staff intelligent accommodating and helpful. Rooms spotless and bar well stocked for a smaller size hotel. We would certainly return for future overnight trips to the Theather . The location was perfect for our trip to a local concert . Your glowing review makes us smile! So great that our staff, accommodations, value, and location was everything you were hoping for on your overnight trip to New York City. Thank you for your wonderful review and consideration for future stays. We love our return guests and hope to see you here with us again soon!

reviews.title: Great trip, wonderful staff
reviews.content: We had a great time at this boutique hotel. Loved the location - SO easy to access the Subway and get anywhere in the City. Loved all of the staff - Hadi and Tyler at the bar absolutely made our trip. Great tips and advice and treated us like locals! Loved it so very much and can't recommend it enough. Thank you for your super review! So great knowing that our location and awesome staff helped make your trip to NYC an exceptional one. We will let Hadi and Tyler know of your compliments as well. We appreciate your recommendations and hope that you choose Distrikt Hotel on your next visit to the Big Apple!

reviews.title: Great Hotel-Awesome Staff
reviews.content: I was very pleased with my recent stay at Distrikt Hotel. The hotel is conveniently located next to Port Authority with several places for overnight parking and quick access to the tunnel when you want to get out of the city. The bathroom was larger than most other hotels in NYC and the room was very clean. Your awesome review makes us smile! We agree that our location is ideal and we are very pleased to hear that our wonderful staff and accommodations overall was everything you were hoping for during your stay with us. We will definitely let our staff know of your praises. Thank you for your positive feedback! We hope that you choose Distrikt on your next visit to the Big Apple!

reviews.title: Excellent location and helpful staff
reviews.content: The hotel is located on 40th Street between 8th and 9th avenue. You can reach a lot of destinations on foot within 10 min. It is also close to Penn Station (10min on foot) so it's a bonus if you fly in via Newark Airport and take the NJ Transit or Amtrak train. Your super positive review makes us smile! We couldn't agree with you more on how convenient our location is and are elated to hear how smooth your visit to the Big Apple went due to our accommodating staff. Thank you for your raving review and we hope you consider Distrikt Hotel the next time you visit New York City!

reviews.title: Distrikt Boutique hotel is a find
reviews.content: This is a great little hotel!! Rooms are so spacious and king bed was super comfy!! Price was around $200, booked on hotels.com. Can't beat that!! Large walk in shower. Bar was great and they have some nice sandwich things. Not a full restaurant but served some nice breakfast items if you want to grab something right there. Would highly recommend this little place. Great location and super friendly, helpful staff. Thank you for your kind words and we are pleased to hear you had such a wonderful time with us. We are delighted to know that our staff, location, value, and accommodations were satisfactory during your visit to New York City. So great knowing you enjoyed your time at our Collage Bistro & Bar as well. Again, thank you for your kind words about our staff, they work hard to make sure that each and every person that stays with us is given a wonderful experience. We appreciate your recommendations and hope you stay with us again on your next trip to NYC!

reviews.title: Great stay in NY
reviews.content: Very nice hotel!! The people working the front desk were very helpful, loved the daily fruit flavored ice water also!! We would definitely stay here again, location was near everything and subway is near by! Thank you for your super positive review! It's great knowing that our amenities and staff were very pleasant and accommodating. We appreciate your consideration for future stays and hope to see you here with us again soon!

reviews.title: Very nice hotel with large rooms for NYC
reviews.content: Very good hotel wit large rooms for NYC. People should go to their site for the best rates, as it did not appear we got the best deal on Hotels.com Shower was not water tight and there was some leakage. They were very good about holding luggage before checkin and after checkout.

reviews.title: Great reception staff, convenient location
reviews.content: We arrived late in the evening, however, the reception staff were expecting us and were really on the ball, and made us feel very welcome. Without us asking, they provided us with a local map, subway map and several other leaflets about things to do in New York - I think this is brilliant, and a great shame not all hotels do it. Nothing was too much trouble for the reception staff, and everything was done with a small. We had lots of laughs with them. There was a little birthday cake and card in my room - the travel agent must have told them it was a trip to celebrate my birthday - I thought that was a lovely touch, especially for such a big hotel. The bar was very modern but a bit on the expensive side. The room was clean and well appointed - tea and coffee maker, fridge, iron. The shower was a proper shower (as opposed to one over the bath) and modern and clean. The hotel is in a very convenient location, close to the subway. We here at Distrikt are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us and that you chose to write such a kind review. We do our best to ensure that every detail of a guests stay with us is absolutely perfect because we want your stay with us to be memorable and one you will look back on fondly. So good knowing that our location and accommodations were beyond satisfactory. We certainly appreciate the kind words about our staff and will let them know of your praises. We hope you'll come back and visit us soon!

reviews.title: Nice room. Good location.
reviews.content: Liked the hotel very much. Some minor faults, like bath robes and blankets need upgrading. Good experience. Good location. Would book there again. Inhouse breakfast was below standard in service and choice. Thanks for the positive review! We appreciate your opinions and consideration for future stays! We hope you'll keep us in mind for the next time you frequent the Big Apple!

reviews.title: Great base
reviews.content: Conveniently located on a related really quiet street near Times Square and very near subway lines, providing easy access from JFK airport. The hotel lobby was usually quiet but well equipped with Internet access from fixed terminals. The room and bathroom well well appointed and clean. A bar restaurant is available on site, so I did not use it. Thank you for your kind words about your recent stay with us! We like to think we are a great home base for all of our guests to begin their adventures here in NYC, as we are close to many wonderful attractions and sights. We hope you managed to explore many of the things NYC has to offer during your time with us. We are so excited to have lived up to your hotel needs and hope you keep us in mind for the next time you visit the Big Apple!

reviews.title: Big rooms and short walk to everything in midtown
reviews.content: We opted for the king room with a view and it was a good size. Definitely worth the extra for a long stay in New York. Others have mentioned the bus station and parole office nearby, but the area is totally safe ate any time of day or night. And I'd prefer here to staying in the Times Square area. The staff were friendly, always greeting us when we came or went. We had no need to ask for anything extra, but I'm sure they would have been happy to help if needed. For breakfast or a cheap meal, check out Corvo coffee or the pizza place on the corner. Thank you for your positive review! We are delighted to know that our staff, location, and accommodations were satisfactory during your visit to New York City. We appreciate your breakdown of all the things that helped make your stay a great one and hope that you choose Distrikt on your next visit to New York City!

reviews.title: Great location!
reviews.content: Stayed here during a weekend trip to New York to catch a show. Very close to Times Square and the Broadway shows. Lively area, but our room was quiet and peaceful. The room and bathroom were quite generous in size when compared to other NY hotels in the same area. The staff were absolutely wonderful! Front desk clerks, housekeepers, and doorman all were very cheerful and helpful, and genuinely seemed to enjoy their jobs. Thank you for your kind words and we are pleased to hear you had such a wonderful time with us. We like to think we are a great home base for all of our guests to begin their adventures here in NYC, as we are close to many wonderful attractions and sights. So great that our staff and accommodations was beyond satisfactory. We will spread the good word to our staff as well. Please keep us in mind for your future visits to New York City!

reviews.title: Business Trip
reviews.content: Lovely stay here w/ very nice and helpful people at the front desk. The bedding was soft and plush and the room was quaint but comfortable. I noticed water damage on the ceiling and a stray hair on the side table which gave the nice room a bit of a more dingy vibe. Overall the location is perfect for the office I was visiting in Times Square and the stay was very good. We're very happy to hear that your overall experience at Distrikt was great. It's good knowing that our staff were accommodating and our comfortable bedding was satisfactory during your stay. We appreciate your positive feedback and hope that you choose Distrikt on your next visit to New York!

reviews.title: Great Rooms
reviews.content: Little hotel, close to Times Square, great rooms. Very clean Great staff. They have a bar with some snacks if you are hungry. They have late check out with an additional. You can order from internet and they send you the package to your room. We're pleased to know that you had such a pleasant stay with us. It's good knowing that our amenities and accommodations were satisfactory and that your trip went smoothly. We appreciate your breakdown of all of the things that made your stay a great one. We hope you might consider us again next time you return to NYC!

reviews.title: First NYC Trip
reviews.content: The location of Distrikt Hotel was the biggest plus for me. It is only a couple blocks from time square and there are multiple subway stops easily within walking distance. It made it very easy to get around the city despite it being my first time. Also the option to store luggage at the hotel before check in was wonderful. It allowed us to have an entire day out sightseeing without having to haul all our things as well. Thank you for your positive review! So great that our accommodations and location was everything you were hoping for on your first trip to New York City. We appreciate your feedback and hope that you choose Distrikt on your next visit New York!

reviews.title: Great hotel, great location
reviews.content: It was my first time in New York and really feel lucky to have stayed at this hotel. The location is within walking distance to restaurant row, Times Square and is right across from a taxi pick up location. Incredibly easy to navigate around the city from this location. The hotel itself is very modern, there a restaurant/lounge that has a small but good menu. The room was spacious, artfully designed and clean. The staff was great! Tyler in the lounge gave us great tips, the front desk was attentive and very friendly. I was even surprised with a cupcake for my birthday, a lovely small touch. I would most definitely stay here again. We're so happy to hear our modern charms wowed you during your recent stay with us at Distrikt! We agree our location is very ideal, and are elated that our accommodations were beyond satisfactory. It is always a pleasure to celebrate such special occasions with our guest and we will be sure to pass down your praises to Tyler and the rest of the staff. We do appreciate you taking the time to respond so emphatically in regard to your visit and hope you might return to us for future stays to come!

reviews.title: Great Stay for a Great Price
reviews.content: Ideal location close to everything in central Manhattan by foot and close to subways to get north and south. Room was ideal size with a very good bed and was very clean. Hotel staff was very friendly at check in. They personally checked to see if my room was ready because I had arrived an hour before check in. We are thrilled to hear that we were able to meet all of your expectations during your stay. It's good knowing that our location was ideal, our accommodations were satisfactory, and our staff went above and beyond for you. Please don't hesitate to make Distrikt your home away from home the next time you visit New York City!

reviews.title: Great place to stay
reviews.content: A central position in Midtown makes this hotel a great place to stay- close to the subway ,Times Square and Bryant Park and not far from Central Station,Penn Station and Port Authority Bus Terminal opposite. The room was very big with sigt beds.The staff is very friendly and helpful. On my birthday I was served a cupcake in my room with compliments from the staff. We should like to return! Thank you for your glowing Distirkt Hotel review! We are thrilled to have helped make your birthday celebration a special one. It's always a privilege to get to celebrate with our guests. We will let our staff know of your praises. Please don't hesitate to make Distrikt your home away from home the next time you drop by the Big Apple!

reviews.title: Great location
reviews.content: Very friendly and clean hotel. The Mattress on Beds was terrible but plus for that they had duvets. Location was only a ten minutes walk from Times Square. Breakfast was not to special but a lot of varieties nearby the hotel. Thank you for your feedback! Though we are regretful to read that your stay was not exceptional we are pleased to hear that our staff, location, and cleanliness made your visit to New York City much smoother. If you decide to stay with us in the future, please know that no matter what the issue is calling our front desk will be the most efficient way to solve any potential inconveniences you run into at the hotel. Again we appreciate your review and hope that you choose Distrikt on your next visit to the Big Apple!

reviews.title: Brilliant location with great sized rooms!
reviews.content: Location was perfect coming from the airport and travelling around the city with Port Authority right on the doorstep. The rooms were a great size, especially for New York. The bathroom was also huge, with a large shower! Staff were polite and very helpful with our questions and queries! Would definitely recommend for families, young and older people alike! We are elated to hear that you had such a wonderful stay with us. We agree that our location is very convenient for traveling to and from. It is also great that our staff were able to show you the Distrikt way and our accommodations was everything you were hoping for on your visit to New York City. We appreciate your recommendations and hope that you choose Distrikt on your next visit to the Big Apple!

reviews.title: Close to Theatres
reviews.content: Liked that your key card is also secure pass for lift, so no-one could just get in lift unless staying there. Clean room, with coffee/tea facility and fridge. Small safe at bottom of wardrobe. Being disabled would prefer higher up for ease to see I had emptied eveything out. Shower needs to have handle to hold onto for safety and feel secure. Thank you for your positive review! It's good knowing that our accommodations were satisfactory however, we do hope you brought these issues up during your stay as we would have been able to rectify them. We certainly appreciate your feedback and hope you might consider us again next time when you return to NYC!

reviews.title: Priced right and great location
reviews.content: Everything except the bed was great about this hotel. From the welcome to cleanliness of room and bathroom to room amenities were very nice. My only complaint would be the firmness of the mattress...too firm for me unfortunately. Otherwise great! We are happy to hear that we were able to meet almost all your expectations on your visit to the Big Apple. It's good knowing that our wonderful staff and accommodations were satisfactory and that your trip went smoothly during your stay. Though our beds are usually praised for the amount of comfort, we do hope you brought this issue up during your stay as we would have been able to resolve it. We hope you might consider us again next time when you return to NYC!

reviews.title: Loved my stay
reviews.content: Stylish, sleek, great location. Room was a great size and spotlessly clean, and enjoyed the keurig machine. Only downside is rooms facing the street are kind of noisy, but it is NYC after all. Check-in staff were friendly. Will definitely stay at Distrikt again. We're so happy to hear our modern charms wowed you during your recent stay with us at Distrikt! We agree our location is ideal and glad that you were able to make use of the amenities we offer here at Distrikt. We certainly appreciate your kind words about our staff and your consideration for future stays! We hope to see you here with us again soon!

reviews.title: Great hotel.
reviews.content: Stayed at the District recently and had a great experience. First time in NYC. The staff was great and the room was very nice. Since there were only four rooms on our floor, it was very quiet. Would stay again. We are elated to hear that we were able to meet all your expectations on your first visit to the Big Apple. So great that our staff, accommodations, and location was everything you were hoping during your stay with us. We agree that the hotel is fairly quiet due to the number of rooms on each level. We appreciate your kind review and consideration for future stays! We hope to see you here with us again soon!

reviews.title: NYC Awesome!
reviews.content: Great location, great staff and a great hotel. Upscale boutique style, the bathroom is big and the shower fits an NBA player. On the southern edge of Midtown and Hell's Kitchen, it was the perfect spot for us. Madison Square Garden, Central Park, Times Square - we could walk to all. Lots of great restaurants and classic Irish pub's all around too. Close to the theatre district, MOMA, Rockefeller Center and so much more. Arrived early and they held our bags while we set off to explore. Came back to find our check-in all ready, including the bags. The place smells great too - lemongrass and lavender soaps and lotions I'm guessing. We're so happy to hear our modern charms wowed you during your recent stay with us at Distrikt! We agree our location is ideal and are pleased that our accommodations were beyond satisfactory. We do appreciate you taking the time to respond so emphatically in regard to your visit and hope you might return to us for future stays to come!

reviews.title: M Snell
reviews.content: An intimate Hotel located on West 42nd St right in the heart of the garment district just a few minutes walk to Time Square and close to the subway and major bus terminal. If you are looking for a place that is not in the heart of time square then this hotel is worth a look.

reviews.title: Birthday Celebration in NYC
reviews.content: Great location, close to Broadway, across from Port Authority which was a little weird. However, great restaurants right in the area in Hells Kitchen! Lovely, warm staff. Nicely appointed rooms at a somewhat reasonable NYC price. Liked that it was a boutique hotel not a big chain. After a very early flight, we were fortunate they could accommodate an early check in. I mentioned it was my husband's birthday and on the 2nd night they had a special cupcake and handwritten note of birthday wishes delivered from the staff. That was above and beyond service! Thank you for your kind words and we are pleased to hear you had such a wonderful time with us. We like to think we are a great home base for all of our guests to begin their adventures here in NYC, as we are close to many wonderful attractions and sights. We hope you managed to explore many of the things NYC has to offer during your time with us. As a boutique hotel, we like to the stray away from the traditional hotel aesthetic in order to provide our guests with a unique and memorable experience. Thank you for your kind words about our staff, they work hard to make sure that each and every person that stays with us is given a wonderful experience. We hope you stay with us again on your next trip to NYC!

reviews.title: Clean, comfortable, and close to Theatre District
reviews.content: Exceeded my expectations. Excellent staff, great location (just a few blocks off of Times Square and very near Port Authority), clean rooms, fantastic water pressure in the shower, and yummy breakfast downstairs. I would definitely recommend Distrikt to friends and family looking for a clean, convenient place to spend some downtime while in the city! Thank you for your awesome review! We are elated to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations during your visit to New York City. We agree that the water pressure in the showers and breakfast in our Collage Bistro are quite satisfying. Thank you for your kind words about our staff, we will pass on the good word. We do appreciate you taking the time to respond so emphatically in regard to your visit and hope you might return to us for future stays to come!

reviews.title: Declining
reviews.content: This is the third time I have stayed here and I am noticing a decline. Used to receive a nice welcome treat. No more. The desk staff used to be attentive and friendly, with a bellman who greeted you by name. Maybe he retired. The room was the worst of the three different rooms I've had. The hair dryer didn't dry and made sparking noises the one time I tried it. The shower pressure was so hard it was painful. We joked about having to steel ourselves before showering. It was probably the setting on the shower head that neither of us could reach. The bed was fine but I hated the hard pillows. The tv has terrible reception. We couldn't watch CBS or NBC. The good news is that the hotel is centrally located and is a good value. It is just off 9th Ave, which is lively and jam packed with restaurants. The building is not old and therefore not creepy. It is mere yards from a subway stop that includes the A train with an easy connection to JFK. Also, they have a lovely seasonal cocktail in the bar and charming bartenders. I'd recommend the place on value and location, but I miss the little things. If you select this place don't let them place you in a low floor, front facing room. Value, yes, but sadly I may need to find a new 'go to' place in NYC. Thank you for your feedback. Though we are happy to hear you had a pleasant time in our Collage Bar, we are very sorry to hear that we did not live up to your expectations this time around. We at the Distrikt pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service and we apologize for not meeting the high standards that not only you expected, but that we also expect from ourselves. We agree that the location is ideal however, we are very regretful that we were unable to provide you with this personal experience during your last visit. If you decide to give us one more shot in the future, bringing up any issues during your stay will allow us to rectify some of them. Again, while we wish you had a more pleasant time during your stay with us, we certainly thank you for taking the time to provide honest feedback on your experience. If you decide to give us another chance on your next trip to NYC please contact us directly next time so we can make your next stay as enjoyable as possible! Best wishes from the entire Distrikt Team

reviews.title: Expectations were higher
reviews.content: The hotel staff were all so great. But the location, and price for the hotel were not worth the price whatsoever. The bathroom had no fan, thus creating the temperature in the room to increase. The rooms are all located by the elevator. The hotel location is not the greatest, for the value of the small room. I was expecting much more for my dollar. Thank you for taking your time to write your review. Though we are excited to here that our staff were all so wonderful, we are sorry to hear we were not able to exceed your expectations. We do hope you brought these issues up during your stay as we would of been able to rectify some of the issues you experienced. Furthermore, all of the bathrooms in the hotel have vents. The vents in the bathrooms are continually pulling air through a system on the roof. Although they don‚Äôt make noise or have switches, they are working. Since we are a boutique hotel, there are only five rooms per level leaving some rooms closer to the elevator however, not all of them. Regarding our immediate scene, most of our guest find it convenient and exhilarating since we are across from the Port Authority and in between the bustling streets of Times Square and Hell's Kitchen however, we are sorry it was unsatisfying for you. Again, we do appreciate you taking the time to provide us with your feedback and hope to be able to welcome you again for your future visit to New York City.

reviews.title: Nice, tidy and spacious.
reviews.content: By coincidence I booked Distrikt hotel. I did prefer spacious rooms and the grand room is bigger compared to other. It's also tidy. Perfect situated in garment district and rather little noise. Very helpful staff. We are elated to hear that we were able to meet all your expectations on your visit to the Big Apple! It's good knowing that our staff, location, and accommodations were satisfactory and that your trip went smoothly during your stay. We hope you might consider us again next time you return to NYC!

reviews.title: Outstanding service
reviews.content: Location, location, location! The service we received was outstanding. The hotel accommodations were terrific. Exceeded our expectations, looking forward to returning in the future. The staff treated you warmly and we had a great stay. We are elated to hear that we have exceeded your expectations during your stay with us! It's great knowing that our location and staff especially made your visit to New York a terrific one. We will spread the good word to our staff as well. Thank you for your raving review and consideration for future stays. We love our return guests and hope to see you here with us again soon!

reviews.title: VEry clean hotel, great location, very friendly staff
reviews.content: Just a very easy hotel for a trip to NYC. Clean with fantastic staff, We were there for 4 nights, the staff suggested ways to travel / things to do / restaurants - all fantastic! The hotel is clean and comfortable and in a great location! Thank you for your kind words and we are pleased to hear you had such a wonderful time with us. We like to think we are a great home base for all of our guests to begin their adventures here in NYC, as we are close to many wonderful attractions and sights. We hope you managed to explore many of the things NYC has to offer during your time with us. Thank you for your kind words about our staff, they work hard to make sure that each and every person that stays with us is given a wonderful experience. We hope you might consider us again next time you return to NYC!
